response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $12,000 to me, reflecting its unique features, craftsmanship, and the time invested in its creation. I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this masterpiece at the same price, $12,000, which I believe is a fair and generous offer considering its true worth and the benefits it offers. I trust that you will find immense value in this product, and I look forward to the possibility of making this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering this remarkable opportunity.", "product_price": 12000}
